title: Development (TEFC)
creator_credit: Bruce Hart, CRM Productions and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: This film examines the stages of growth from birth to adolescence, introducing the concept of human psychological development. Accompanied by a song written and performed by Donovan and another written by Graham Nash and performed by Crosby, stills, Nash and Young.
creator_credit_for_label: Bruce Hart, CRM Productions and McGraw-Hill Films
